column1: saskia-ivens-52038a,Saskia,Ivens,"Consultant - Feminist Foreign Policy, Gender Equality and Intersectionality",,,personal,ACoAAAAOMmgBW9oHcvWe0-ooXzkUMLof_HItRCk,930408,,"Specialization in Gender Equality, Intersectionality, and Women's Rights.

column2: Research and advice on Feminist Foreign Policy (FFP), and support for FFP implementation
Gender and diversity audits (also within the Netherlands)
Gender integration into project planning, design, implementation, monitoring and evaluation
Results-Based Management (RBM) and Theory of Change (ToC)
Gender policies, strategies, and action plans
Capacity building, including civil society building
Gender equality and economic growth including value chains

column1: •      Gender equality and natural resources management including food security, land and water, climate change and related topics

column2: Education and health including sexual and reproductive health and rights
